item.title: SpringBoot集成ZeroMQ
item.description: 开发ZeroMQ的SpringBoot Starter。 resources中META-INF中增加文件spring.factories： org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.EnableAutoConfiguration=net.ytoframework.plugin.zeromq.ZeroMQAutoConfiguration 配置

item.title: SpringBoot集成elastic-job-lite
item.description: SpringBoot集成elastic-job-lite 1.pom文件中引用jar包 <!-- elastic-job-lite --> <dependency> <groupId>com.dangdang</groupId> <artifactId>elastic-job-common-core</artifactId> <version>2.1.5</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>com.dangdang</groupId> <artifactId>elastic-job-lite-core</artifactId> <version>2.1.5</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>com.dangdang</groupId> <artifactId>elastic-job-lite-spring</artifactId> <version>2.1.5</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>com.google.guava</groupId> <artifactId>guava</artifactId> <version>18.0</version> </dependency> 2.本地启
